ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They were defeated then and there, transformed into humbled men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus there and then they were vanquished and overthrown, humiliated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh and his men were defeated and put to shame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The magicians who were defeated on the spot and were proved to be worthless,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They were therefore defeated here and they turned back humiliated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So they were defeated there and returned disgraced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus they were vanquished there, and they went back abased.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So they were vanquished there, and they turned about, humbled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus were they there defeated and brought low.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh and his men were defeated and utterly humiliated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus they were overcome and made to look abiect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereat they were vanquished, and they retreated, humiliated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So the (great ones) were vanquished there and then, and were made to look small.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they were defeated there and then, and were returned disgraced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: they were defeated and turned belittled,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There they were defeated, and utterly reduced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Pharaoh and his people were overcome right there and became debased.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:119] Thus were they, that is, Pharaoh and his folk, there defeated, becoming humiliated — they ended up abased.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus were they there defeated) upon which Moses was victorious against them (and brought low) and they were humiliated.
